name: House Hopper
storyline: JUMP, FALL, CRACK, REPEAT! This stress inducing golf-like 3D platformer will push your resolve to the limit. Climb through super-hard levels, solve puzzles, unlock hidden playable objects! Beat your highscores! Is the game too hard? GET BETTER!
summary:
House Hopper is a challenging, stylised 3D, precision platformer where you jump through house-themed levels in a minigolf-ish fashion to collect keys to all the rooms, find all playable everyday-use objects and beat your high scores while avoiding falling, crashing and getting burned the best you can at the same time.
Jump. Fall. Crash. Repeat!
